          "parent_id": "821ae8d5-410a-4903-8d6b-19e031fd8a11",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "function quadraticBezierLength(x1,y1,x2,y2,x3,y3)\n    var a, e, c, d, u, a1, e1, c1, d1, u1, v1x, v1y;\n\n    v1x = x2 * 2;\n    v1y = y2 * 2;\n    d = x1 - v1x + x3;\n    d1 = y1 - v1y + y3;\n    e = v1x - 2 * x1;\n    e1 = v1y - 2 * y1;\n    c1 = (a = 4 * (d * d + d1 * d1));\n    c1 += (b = 4 * (d * e + d1 * e1));\n    c1 += (c = e * e + e1 * e1);\n    c1 = 2 * Math.sqrt(c1);\n    a1 = 2 * a * (u = Math.sqrt(a));\n    u1 = b / u;\n    a = 4 * c * a - b * b;\n    c = 2 * Math.sqrt(c);\n    return (a1 * c1 + u * b * (c1 - c) + a * Math.log((2 * u + u1 + c1) / (u1 + c))) / (4 * a1);\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
